nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.preferences

Interface PreferenceServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PreferenceService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreferenceServiceImpl

    public interface PreferenceServiceLocal
extends PreferenceService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

      Returns the channels a member would receive a notification
      boolean receivesMessage(Member member, Message.Type type)
      Checks whether the given member has chosen to be notified on messages of the given type (no matter which notification kind - internal message / mail / sms)
